value:
I hope Father doesn't miss me too
much. I'm a little worried about him...

I played a big role in the resistance!
What do you think about that, huh?
You...look like you don't believe me...

One Larum's Stamina Lunch! It'll put
some spring in your step. Er...not that
much! Hey, where are you going?

Do you want to dance? Let's give it
a try! Step one, step two... *giggle*
You have no idea how to dance.

That's it... You're getting it... Sway
your hips... Ha! Now you've learned
my secrets, so I must kill you!$k$pNot really! I mean, if I killed you,
you'd never learn to dance!

I'm Larum! There, now that we
know each other...how about I
dance for you?

That was perfect! I'm so good that
I scare myself sometimes! Don't
you agree?

I wonder if I should bend like this...
What do you think?

Ow-ow-owie! I think I sprained my
ankle...

Now I can make my dances be even
more breathtaking! Thanks!

La-la-la, la-la-Larum... That's me!
Larum! Ready to watch me dance?

Hey, $Nu!$k$pI was pretty great tonight, wasn't
I? You can be honest.$k$pI spun, I twirled, I... Hey! You aren't
paying attention. And you weren't
watching earlier, were you?$k$pWell then! I'll be sure to dance
circles around enemies AND allies
in our next battle.$k$pYou won't be able to look away!
That got your imagination fired up,
didn't it?$k$pIt didn't? Oh, fine. I see how it is.$k$pI'll keep dancing until you notice! I'll
stick to you from sundown to sunup!
You'll see just how good I really am!
えい！
どう？
きゃあっ
I'm in to much trouble!
Not so fast!
Got your attention?
Ooh! How exciting!
Aw, too bad...
Sorry, Father...
giggle
'Round and 'round!
Like my dancing, do ya?!
Hi there—I'm Larum! I may not look it, but I'm part of the resistance!
Aww! You're so cute when you're blushing!
Wanna see my new dance? Hmm... I dunno... Maybe it's not ready...
I owe my father everything for adopting me—I'd do anything for him.
Here, one Larum's Stamina Lunch special, hot off the coals! This'll get you up and moving!
OK!
Hmm?
If you say so!
